com.flight_ticket_search.Service

Interface RequestFlightService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestFlightServiceImpl

    public interface RequestFlightService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.util.List<Ticket>> getRoundTrip(java.lang.String dCityOne, java.lang.String aCityOne, java.lang.String dTimeOne, java.lang.String aTime)
      Return List of list of tickets of the request round trip ticket Get the request parameter from the UI for round trip, including departing city, arriving city, departure time, arrival time, and return all the tickets in List for iteration
      TicketCollection getSingleTrip(java.lang.String dCity, java.lang.String aCity, java.lang.String dTime)
      Return all the ticketCollection of the single trip ticket Get the request parameter from the UI, including the departing city, arriving city, and departure time, for one single trip and return all the tickets in collection

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleTrip

        TicketCollection getSingleTrip(java.lang.String dCity,
                               java.lang.String aCity,
                               java.lang.String dTime)
        Return all the ticketCollection of the single trip ticket Get the request parameter from the UI, including the departing city, arriving city, and departure time, for one single trip and return all the tickets in collection
        Parameters:
        dCity - the departing airport city chosen by user, for eg. "BOS"
        aCity - the arriving airport city chosen by user, for eg. "LAX"
        dTime - the departing date chosen by user, for eg. "2015-05-15"
        Returns:
        List of ticket collections [departing tickets]

      • getRoundTrip

        java.util.List<java.util.List<Ticket>> getRoundTrip(java.lang.String dCityOne,
                                                    java.lang.String aCityOne,
                                                    java.lang.String dTimeOne,
                                                    java.lang.String aTime)
        Return List of list of tickets of the request round trip ticket Get the request parameter from the UI for round trip, including departing city, arriving city, departure time, arrival time, and return all the tickets in List for iteration
        Parameters:
        dCityOne - departing city airport code - departing trip
        aCityOne - arriving city airport code - arriving trip
        dTimeOne - departing time (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) - departing trip
        aTime - arriving time (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) - arriving trip
        Returns:
        List of list of tickets [ [departing tickets] [returning tickets] ]
